name: Summary possession proceedings; venue
text: In the case of summary possession proceedings, the person entitled to the possession of the premises shall bring and prosecute the person's action in the district court of the circuit wherein the lands and premises in question are situated. [CC 1859, §940; am L 1905, c 95, §1; RL 1925, §2779; RL 1935, §4014; RL 1945, §10405; RL 1955, §240-6; HRS ; am L 1972, c 90, §8(c); gen ch 1985]
